name: Mail It!
description:
Mail It! is a game made for the Niantic Lightship VPS Challenge/Hackathon!

It uses VPS to make an interactive game based around a physical location, so you have to get out to play it! 

The focus is put on gameplay and physical AR interactions rather than art and visuals.

You need to get the mail out of the mailboxes and then give... or feed it to the creatures nearby!

The mail is color coded on the type of garbage can. This way a younger audience will link the right colors in their head for sorting garbage (Green = bio, orange is plastic, black/gray is mixed)

There is 1 build with and 1 without occlusion. This is done so you can use both when occlusion does not work properly.

ONLY playable at the VPS location at Willem De Zwijgersingel/Statensingel, Gouda

Source Code (for reference or IOS builds) downloadable or found at https://github.com/smitdylan2001/VPSHackathon
